fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal a player each night.
- Watch another player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Healing a player grants them Powerful defense and removes poison, etc.
- Watching a player lets you learn the names of up to three random players who visit them, and you'll know if more than three players visit them.
- You may only heal yourself once and you may not heal Town roles that have attributes or have used abilities that have publicly revealed themselves. (i.e. Mayor, Reserved, King, the other King)
